channel.title: Java is my bitch i need your help
channel.description:
Well since you are teh super coder.. I need your help.
I was trying to make karils x bow special.. So I simply copied the dark bow special and all that since I wanted to use the same projectiles.
The projectiles and the double hit is good and everything, its the animation thats a little wacked.
What I mean is the second hit which should shoot the same animation as the first hit i.e. karils bow shooting anim does not do the same animation on the second hit but rather just punches him..
And I've been fiddling with the Animations but it didn't fix it..
HELP PL0X!

item.title: Java is my bitch i need your help
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Ok i will be on your server, in about 20 seconds.

Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Java is my bitch i need your help

item.title: Java is my bitch i need your help
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Post the code, and specify where the second hit takes place; what i mean is, where in that method or whatever does it make it twice.

BTW you can’t punch with a bow, your probably didn’t put the weapon animation for it, or have it.

Read full topic
